bibl.title: George Kotros v. Henry M. White. Order to Show Cause
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: In the District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division
In the matter of the application of GEORGE KOTROS for a writ of Habeas Corpus

THIS CAUSE came on regularly for hearing upon the application of George Kotros for a writ of habeas corpus, and it appearing to the court that there is reasonable ground for investigating the detention and imprisonment of petitioner, it is now

ORDERED that Henry M. White, United States Commissioner of Immigration, be, and he is hereby, ordered and required to personally appear in this court on Monday, the 17th day of January, 1921, at the hour of 10 2 o'clock AM., and then and there show cause, if any he has, why he continues to detain and imprison the said George Kotros; and also to show cause why he should not be discharged and released a writ of habeas corpus should not
Let a certified copy of this order be served upon said Henry M. White, United States Commissioner of Immigration.
Done in open court his 12 day of January, 1921.
